verses.text: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2492"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w singing|strong="H7440"\w*: \w then|strong="H6213"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*; \add whereof \add*\w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8056"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* streams \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w South|strong="H5045"\w*.

They \w that|strong="H2232"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w in|strong="H2232"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* \w shall|strong="H1832"\w* \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w in|strong="H2232"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*.

Though \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*, \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w forth|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*; \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* sheaves \add with him\add*.
